sentences.sentence: He was sinking into the Slough of Despond.
sentences.translation: 他那时正陷入极度沮丧的状态。

sentences.sentence: That he didn't finished the work on time despond me.
sentences.translation: 他未能准时做完工作，让我非常失望。

sentences.sentence: At that time the country was in the slough of despond.
sentences.translation: 当时该国陷入深深的绝望之中。
